titles.title: Reinvest in America's Retirement Act of 2009
To immediately repeal the income limitation on conversions to Roth IRAs.
Reinvest in America's Retirement Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Reinvest in America's Retirement Act of 2009 - Amends the Tax Increase Prevention and Reconciliation Act of 2005 to advance the effective date of the repeal of income limitations on conversions to Roth individual retirement accounts (Roth IRAs) to December 31, 2008.
